amendment.description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to cut funding for the Southwest Border Regional Commission in half and transfer the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Southwest Border Regional Commission by $2,500,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
